results:
Based on the search results, here's what I found about Dune: Spice Wars and its Early Access success in 2022:

## Game Overview
Dune: Spice Wars is a 4X real-time strategy video game developed by Shiro Games and published by Funcom. The title is set in the Dune universe, it was released in early access in April 2022 and was fully released in September 2023.

## Early Access Launch and Reviews Success

### Steam Reviews Performance
Dune: Spice Wars launched in Early Access on Steam yesterday to great initial reviews with almost 84% of people recommending the game. At the time of writing, the game currently has over 700 reviews, out of which more than 550 have recommended the game, accounting for a total of around 84% positive reviews.(no content)Dune: Spice Wars have received 83% positive reviews, meaning Very Positive, from nearly one thousand players on Steam for its Early Access version.

### Critical Reception
The game received positive reception from both fans and critics during its Early Access period:

The Steam page shows impressive review scores, with "9/10 – IGN 8,5/10 – Gamingway 8/10 – The Games Machine."(no content)Based on my experience playing so far, I think fans of the old Dune RTS games will find a lot to appreciate here. There are more resources and items to manage—so the learning curve is steeper—however this feels like a worthy successor to the Westwood games.

### What Players Praised
The positive reviews have praised how the game has managed to show the cruel desert planet of Arrakis by keeping everything very simple and meaningful. In terms of Story, most users loved the diplomacy and trading that happens; however, few have criticized the combat style.(no content)Make no mistake however, Dune: Spice Wars has far more than just its appealing art style going for it. There are layers to this game that left me wanting to—even after defeat multiple times, on easy—stride knee deep back into its glistening sands and find my way to victory on the mysterious desert planet of Arrakis.

### Early Access Development Success
Shiro Games unveils Dune: Spice War's early access roadmap following a success launch into early access on PC.

The Early Access period was well-managed, with the developers stating the early access would supposedly last for 9 to 12 months. They also claim that the early access will help them make the game to its best possible version.

Overall, Dune: Spice Wars had a very successful Early Access launch in 2022, achieving "Very Positive" reviews on Steam with over 80% positive ratings and being praised for its faithful adaptation of the Dune universe and solid strategic gameplay mechanics.
